languages.text: "Признай, тебе просто нравится делать людей рабами. Зачем ты выдумываешь оправдания для резни?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
languages.original_text: "Признай, тебе просто нравится делать людей рабами. Зачем ты выдумываешь оправдания для резни?"

traits.locale_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy the executions. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy the executions. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
"Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"

languages.text: “承认吧，你不过是喜欢把人类改造成奴隶罢了。反正都是大屠杀，有什么必要找借口呢？”
languages.original_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"

traits.locale_text: “承认吧，你不过是喜欢行刑罢了。反正都是大屠杀，有什么必要找借口呢？”

languages.text: 「認めるんだな。お前は単に人を奴隷にすることを楽しんでいるだけだろう。虐殺の言い訳まで考えているのは何故だ？」
languages.original_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"

traits.locale_text: 「認めるんだな。お前は単に人を奴隷にすることを楽しんでいるだけだろう。虐殺の言い訳まで考えているのは何故だ？」

languages.text: «Admítalo, disfruta esclavizando a la gente. ¿Por qué siente la necesidad de inventar excusas para empezar una carnicería?».
languages.original_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"

traits.locale_text: «Admítalo, siempre disfruta de las ejecuciones. ¿Por qué siente la necesidad de inventar excusas para empezar una carnicería?».

languages.text: "Gebt es zu: Es macht Euch einfach Spaß, Leute zu versklaven. Warum haltet Ihr es für nötig, Euch Ausreden für Euer Gemetzel einfallen zu lassen?"
languages.original_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"

traits.locale_text: "Gebt es zu: Euch machen die Hinrichtungen einfach Spaß. Warum haltet Ihr es für nötig, Euch Ausreden für Euer Gemetzel einfallen zu lassen?"

languages.text: « Reconnaissez-le : vous prenez plaisir à asservir votre prochain, voilà tout. Pourquoi vous inventer des prétextes pour assouvir votre soif de sang ? »
languages.original_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"

traits.locale_text: « Reconnaissez-le : vous aimez exécuter des gens, voilà tout. Pourquoi vous inventer des prétextes pour assouvir votre soif de sang ? »

languages.text: "Kabul et işte, milleti köleleştirmekten zevk alıyorsun. Kırım yapmak için niye türlü türlü bahaneler uyduruyorsun ki?"
languages.original_text: "Admit it: you simply enjoy turning people into slaves. Why do you feel the need to come up with excuses for sowing carnage?"
